item.title: A Fabric function for git tagging
item.description: Listed below is a Fabric function for determining the appropriate git reference to deploy during a deployment. It works well with projects run using the git-flow development model. Set-up Assume there is a test environment where: the QA team to assess release candidates developers to run integration tests developers can deploy ‘debug’ builds from a specific (untagged) commit There will also be stage and production environments. Fabric function The following function can be used as part of Fabric build script.
